about_the_game:
Join Our Community and Start Playing!

We’ve created the perfect environment for interacting with players and enjoying the game in Disguise Royale! 🎮 Since there isn’t a large player base yet, by joining our Discord server, you can easily communicate with other players, form teams, and share fun moments!

On our server, you can connect with active players, chat before or during the game, and enjoy even more fun! Don’t miss this chance, let’s play together! 🌟

🎭 Disguise Royale - About This Game 🎭

✨ A Hilarious Game of Hiding, Transforming, and Outsmarting Your Opponents! ✨
Disguise Royale is a physics-based multiplayer game that promises endless laughs and excitement with friends. Disguise yourself as everyday objects 🪑, hide in plain sight 🕵️, and outwit the seekers. Or, become the seeker 🔎 and hunt down the cleverly disguised players!

With a blend of comedy, action, and teamwork, Disguise Royale delivers a unique and thrilling gaming experience that’s perfect for everyone.

🌟 What Makes Disguise Royale Unique?

🎮 Dynamic Gameplay:
Take control of objects with realistic physics and master the art of blending into your surroundings.

🌍 Multiplayer Chaos:
Join your friends or compete against players worldwide in intense and hilarious matches.

🪑 Transform and Hide:
Turn into various items—like a chair, a lamp, or anything in the environment—to fool the seekers.

🤣 Competitive Fun:
Outsmart your opponents with clever strategies or track down every hidden player to win.

🗺️ Variety of Maps and Modes:
Explore diverse environments and enjoy unique game modes tailored for endless replayability.

👫 Perfect for Groups:
Whether online or local, Disguise Royale is the ultimate choice for laugh-filled gaming sessions with friends.

🕵️ Who Is This Game For?

If you enjoy games that mix social interaction, strategy, and humor, Disguise Royale is perfect for you! It's designed for players who love quick, engaging rounds and unforgettable moments with friends.

🚀 Join the Fun Today!

Add Disguise Royale to your wishlist and get ready for the ultimate hide-and-transform experience! 🎉
detailed_description:
Join Our Community and Start Playing!

We’ve created the perfect environment for interacting with players and enjoying the game in Disguise Royale! 🎮 Since there isn’t a large player base yet, by joining our Discord server, you can easily communicate with other players, form teams, and share fun moments!

On our server, you can connect with active players, chat before or during the game, and enjoy even more fun! Don’t miss this chance, let’s play together! 🌟

name: Disguise Royale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI / AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) Or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Disguise Royale, oyuncuların avcılardan kaçmak veya gizlenmiş rakiplerini ortaya çıkarmak için günlük eşyalar gibi dönüşebildiği eğlenceli bir fizik tabanlı çok oyunculu oyundur. Parti oyunları için mükemmel ve kahkahalarla dolu anlar için ideal!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish, Afrikaans, Amharic, Albanian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Dari, Armenian, Estonian, Persian, Filipino, Welsh, Galician, Gujarati, Georgian, Hausa, Hindi, Croatian, Kannada, Catalan, Kazakh, Quechua, K'iche', Khmer, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Kinyarwanda, Sinhala, Sindhi, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Serbian, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Valencian, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu, Cherokee, Uzbek, Hebrew, Igbo, Irish, Scots, Icelandic
*languages with full audio support
